body: Well, since 1.8 came out recently, does this mean we can build maps on 1.8? I know that Avicus will not be updating for some time, but when we do, can these 1.8 maps be looked at? Just because new blocks, mobs, and such. Thanks!
body_tagged: Well, since 1.8 came out recently, does this mean we can build maps on 1.8? I know that Avicus will not be updating for some time, but when we do, can these 1.8 maps be looked at? Just because new blocks, mobs, and such. Thanks!
title: New/Updated Maps?

replies.body: You can, but you should consider it may take some time untill avicus will be updated to 1.8
replies.body_tagged: You can, but you should consider it may take some time untill avicus will be updated to 1.8

replies.body: I certainly hope so, along with kits with it.
replies.body_tagged: I certainly hope so, along with kits with it.
